string.text: An intact and charged PDA. You can try to get information from it on upgrades, hiding places, notes and accounts.
Broken PDA. It is useless and can be discarded.
Intact, but discharged PDA. If you charge it, you can try to retrieve information from it.
A backpack from the body of a dead stalker. Perhaps it has something of value inside. The condition of the backpack might make it suitable for a stash.
An empty backpack, once useful to somebody. Due to its very bad condition, it is not suitable for making a stash.
